cards.name: Communist
cards.description: Steal up to 3 coins from the wealthiest target, giving them to the poorest player.

cards.name: Customs Officer
cards.description: Take the 2 Tax tokens. Keep 1, and place the other on a Role card. All other players must pay 1 coin each time they claim that role.

cards.name: Foreign Consular
cards.description: Take the 2 Treaty tokens. Keep 1, then give the other to another player of your choice. These two players become allies, and cannot target one another, even by Coup.

cards.name: Intellectual
cards.description: Following a loss of influence, Intellectual takes 5 coins from Treasury. Successful challenge results in loss of another influence. Unsuccessful challenge results in challenger losing 1 influence.

cards.name: Lawyer
cards.description: Claim all the coins of a player who is eliminated from the game.

cards.name: Missionary
cards.description: Following a loss of influence (except by Coup), Missionary takes 1 card from Court. Successful challenge results in loss of second influence. Unsuccessful challenge results in challenger losing 1 influence.

cards.name: Peace Keeper
cards.description: Take 1 coin and the Peacekeeper token. Holder of this token cannot be targeted except by Coup.

cards.name: Politician
cards.description: Steal up to 2 coins from a chosen target.

cards.name: Priest
cards.description: All other players must give Priest 1 coin (if able).

cards.name: Protestor
cards.description: Pay 2 coins, select a target. Any other player may then pay 3 coins to force the target to lose 1 influence.

cards.name: Director
cards.description: Draw 2 cards from Court, return any 2 cards to the Court.

cards.name: Newscaster
cards.description: Pay 1 coin to take 3 cards from the Court, then return any 3 cards to the Court.

cards.name: Producer
cards.description: Take 1 card from Court and 1 from any target (targetâ€™s choice). Return any 1 card to court and target.

cards.name: Reporter
cards.description: Take one coin from Treasury and draw 1 card from the Court, then return any card to Court.

cards.name: Writer
cards.description: Draw 1 card from the Court, then if desired, pay 1 coin to draw another. Return the same number of cards to Court.

cards.name: Banker
cards.description: Take 3 coins from Treasury.

cards.name: Capitalist
cards.description: Take 4 coins from Treasury. All other players may claim Capitalist. After resolving challenges, pay 1 coin.

cards.name: Farmer
cards.description: Take 3 coins from Treasury, keep 2 and give 1 to another player.

cards.name: Speculator
cards.description: Take up to 5 coins from Treasury to double your current coins. If challenged successfully, the challenger receives all of your original coins.

cards.name: Spy
cards.description: Take 1 coin from Treasury, then take a second action of your choice. If you reach 10 coins after the first action, the second action must be a Coup.

cards.name: Crime Boss
cards.description: Select a target. The target may pay you 2 coins to end your turn. Otherwise, pay 5 coins and the target loses 1 influence.

cards.name: General
cards.description: Pay 5 coins to make all other targets lose 1 influence.

cards.name: Guerrilla
cards.description: Pay 4 coins to make a target lose 1 influence.

cards.name: Judge
cards.description: Give 3 coins to a target, forcing them to lose a life. If countered or challenged successfully, the target keeps the 3 coins.

cards.name: Mercenary
cards.description: Pay 3 coins to place a Disappear token on a target. That target loses 1 influence after their next turn.
